text: Charles Edmund Garrett (born 16 April 1963) is a British diplomat. He began working for the Foreign & Commonwealth Office in 1987. He was ambassador of the United Kingdom to North Macedonia from 2014 to 2018. Between 2019 and 2022, he was the ambassador of the United Kingdom to Kyrgyzstan. In 2024, he began working for the Commonwealth War Graves Commission. Garrett is married to VÃ©ronique Frances Edmonde Garrett. He has five children. == References == Category:Ambassadors of the United Kingdom Category:1963 births Category:Living people
title: Charles Garrett (diplomat)
